description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding to rear
decision_conditions: There is insufficient information with respect to the impact of the development upon the health of the adjacent tree with high amenity value. In the absence of information it is considered that the proposal would have an adverse impact upon the wellbeing of the tree thereby causing adverse impact upon the visual amenity of the area.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent of the applicant on 16.05.2025
